name.baseName: Municipal wastewater treatment ; Wastewater ; Two-stage activated sludge technology
市政污水处理; 污水 ;两段式活性污泥技术

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Two-stage activated sludge technology is a wastewater treatment method that is typically used to treat wastewater with high organic loads. It divides the wastewater treatment process into two stages: anaerobic and aerobic. In the first stage, the wastewater comes into contact with sludge in an anaerobic environment, where some of the organic material is broken down into simpler organic matter. The second stage is an aerobic environment where microorganisms utilize oxygen to completely decompose the organic matter into water and carbon dioxide, completing the purification of the wastewater. This technology can efficiently treat high concentration organic wastewater and improve wastewater treatment efficiency.
两段式活性污泥技术是一种废水处理方法，通常用于处理有机负荷较高的废水。它将废水处理过程分为两个阶段：厌氧和好氧。在第一阶段，废水在无氧环境中与污泥接触，部分有机物质被分解成更简单的有机物。第二阶段是好氧环境下，微生物利用氧气将有机物彻底分解成水和二氧化碳，完成废水的净化。这种技术能够高效处理高浓度有机废水，提高废水处理效率。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Two-stage activated sludge technology typically involves the following processes:Anaerobic stage:Wastewater first enters an anaerobic tank, where the organic matter in the effluent is decomposed by microorganisms under anaerobic conditions, producing some simple organic matter and gases, such as methane.Under anaerobic conditions, the organic matter is partially degraded, providing better conditions for subsequent treatment stages.Aerobic stage:Treated wastewater flows from the anaerobic tank into the aerobic tank, when the residual organic matter and nitrogen compounds contained in the water are oxidized under aerobic conditions.Under aerobic conditions, using oxygen, aerobic microorganisms continue to decompose and oxidize the organic matter in the sewage, while oxidizing ammonia nitrogen as nitrate nitrogen
两段式活性污泥技术通常包含以下几个过程：厌氧阶段：废水首先进入厌氧池，污水中的有机物质在厌氧条件下被微生物分解，产生一些简单的有机物和气体，例如甲烷。在厌氧条件下，有机物质被部分降解，为后续的处理阶段提供了更好的条件。好氧阶段：处理过的污水从厌氧池流入好氧池，此时水中含有的残余有机物和氮化合物在好氧条件下被氧化。在好氧条件下，利用氧气，好氧微生物继续分解和氧化污水中的有机物，同时氧化氨氮为硝态氮
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described pertains to the treatment of municipal wastewater using a two-stage activated sludge technology. This process is instrumental in purifying wastewater for municipalities before subsequent release into the environment or reclamation for other uses. Its applications are relevant and critical for urban infrastructure in managing and reducing the environmental impact of human activities.
所述工业过程涉及使用两阶段活性污泥技术处理市政污水。这一过程对于在将污水排放到环境之前或为其他用途回收之前，为市政当局净化污水至关重要。其应用对于管理和减少人类活动对环境影响的城市基础设施来说，是相关且至关重要的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Polruang, S., Sirivithayapakorn, S. & Prateep Na Talang, R. A comparative life cycle assessment of municipal wastewater treatment plants in Thailand under variable power schemes and effluent management programs. Journal of Cleaner Production 172, 635–648 (2018).

Polruang, S., Sirivithayapakorn, S. & Prateep Na Talang, R. A comparative life cycle assessment of municipal wastewater treatment plants in Thailand under variable power schemes and effluent management programs. Journal of Cleaner Production 172, 635–648 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, it is important to ensure that the boundaries of the assessment include the specific technological processes of the two-stage activated sludge system as implemented in Rattanakosin, Thailand in 2014. This process may exhibit unique characteristics due to its geographical and technological context, which should be accounted for in the LCA model. Users should verify that the data accurately reflects the operation of the two-stage activated sludge system for municipal wastewater treatment and that any assumptions related to scale, efficiency, and environmental impact are applicable to the assessment at hand.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，必须确保评估范围包括2014年在泰国Rattanakosin实施的两阶段活性污泥系统的具体技术过程。由于其地理和技术背景，这一过程可能会展现独特的特性，这些特性应该在生命周期评估模型中得到考虑。用户应该验证数据是否准确地反映了市政污水处理的两阶段活性污泥系统的运作，并且任何与规模、效率和环境影响相关的假设都适用于当前的评估。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
